name: ext_R5_MedicationKnowledge_definitional
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.MedicationKnowledge.definitional for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationKnowledge.definitional from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationKnowledge|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Minimal definition information about the medication
element.definition: Along with the link to a Medicinal Product Definition resource, this information provides common definitional elements that are needed to understand the specific medication that is being described.
element.comment: `MedicationKnowledge.definitional` has no related element in R4B:MedicationKnowledge

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children unless an empty Parameters resource
constraint.expression: hasValue() or (children().count() > id.count()) or $this is Parameters

constraint.human: Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.definition: Unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.

slicing.description: Extensions are always sliced by (at least) url

element.definition: Specifies how many (or how much) of the items there are in this Medication.  For example, 250 mg per tablet.  This is expressed as a ratio where the numerator is 250mg and the denominator is 1 tablet but can also be expressed a quantity when the denominator is assumed to be 1 tablet.
